display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=J93eVDA1_DsQ7kNvwF-uXGF&_nc_oc=AdlUy2ZWiVY6Qjt2D2VlE2yHolQMlwXjsZ8ahGk6G_BMmQ_ipdvKtKiUguKYX0toJyE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=YNUQYWAZVVcaDboanII-pw&oh=00_AfrzncaTpJpO_mhr4lF6_oyiEEAtD1iJ-8SDEd2wxiEsgw&oe=69777F38)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=geBuF9IRrmsQ7kNvwHXUU2r&_nc_oc=AdnvQZ8SlmfP1cJcoB80UsYWzGz3fZ2pRWAk6YXr_cSJFXr-ZRdkOuusxCQYA5eWfo8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=YNUQYWAZVVcaDboanII-pw&oh=00_AfpU1sv264siDoL3lQCRgdY7xy2AqI4dnqUK-rWasl0Jlg&oe=697784A4)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031422_997444645745145_5320263794737829877_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=oDDGErqrqvoQ7kNvwGKY5cW&_nc_oc=Adn4hMka9dPsbPceBkUNk2zOpNm0knVnby-tK3Ywj_fOvvEqf_KYIKCdwUtTYhJqYYo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=YNUQYWAZVVcaDboanII-pw&oh=00_AfrjlPnmUp8Lwx-TlOs45DujbpefjrLxR9pdE5kiMK1-Fw&oe=697774CE)

There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
